item.title: Reverse Engineering Kivra's API
item.description:
Kivra is a digital service that many companies use to send documents to Swedish citizens, such as bills, tax notices and an occasional reminder such as â€œHey, itâ€™s time for a doctor visit!â€ letting you know youâ€™re not invincible anymore.

It also collects all receipts of purchases youâ€™ve made, if you want them to! The coolest part? You automatically stop receiving paper documents in your mailbox or receipts in-store, because youâ€™ve signed up to get them digitally instead! Itâ€™s the perfect gift for adulthood. ğŸ˜‰
